Title: Second LNG tanker lifts LNG from sanctioned Arctic LNG 2 this year
Description: An LNG carrier blacklisted by the US has become the second vessel to dock and load at Russiaâ€™s sanctioned 19.8 mtpa Arctic LNG 2 plant.
Author: JS

Title: Elba Island feed gas volumes dip as facility starts planned maintenance
Description: The feed gas supplies to the 2.5 mtpa Elba Island LNG export plant in Georgia, US have bottomed out due planned maintenance.
Author: JS

Title: Barossa project 97% complete: Santos
Description: Australian independent Santos has reached an approximately 97% completion rate for its Barossa project, which it expects to commence production in the third quarter of this year.
Author: JS

Title: FERC clears introduction of hazardous liquids to Phase 2 of Plaquemines LNG
Description: The Federal Energy Regulatory Commission (FERC) has approved the introduction of hazardous fluids into Block 14 of the Phase 2 of Plaquemines LNG as exports peak in June.
Author: JS

Title: Freeport LNG shuts Train 2 again after compressor issue; eighth outage since May
Description: Freeport LNG temporarily shut down the second liquefaction train at its 15 mtpa Texas plant earlier this week after a compressor malfunction caused the unit to trip and triggered nearly 12 hours of gas flaring.
Author: CK
